## VerseOptions.rtcConfiguration property

The `rtc_configuration` parameter is a parameter of the constructor of [RTCPeerConnection](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/RTCPeerConnection/RTCPeerConnection)<!-- -->. It is mainly used to configure `iceServers` and `certificates`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
rtcConfiguration?: RTCConfiguration;
```
